comments.author: TryNinja
comments.body: A √∫ltima etapa antes do merge foi realizada com sucesso!Quote from: https://watcher.guru/news/ethereum-successfully-upgrades-to-bellatrix-mergeThe Ethereum Merge is divided into a two-step process. The first is the Bellatrix upgrade which was successfully deployed at the counter towards a TTD threshold (terminal total difficulty) of 58750000000000000000000 in the measure of activity on the network.The next upgrade ‚ÄòParis‚Äô will be initiated and the technical effects of the switch from PoS to PoW will open. After Paris is triggered, the Merge is only a few days away from being complete. However, the Ethereum foundation has not given an exact date for the Merge. Their latest blog suggests that the transition might be complete anywhere between September 15 to 20.O Vitalik diz que o merge deve ocorrer entre os dias 13 e 15 desse m√™s: https://twitter.com/VitalikButerin/status/1566993505326710785
